text: 4:16 Matyu 24:30-31; Aposel 1:11; 1 Korin 15:23; 15:52; 1 Tesalonika 1:10; 2 Tesalonika 1:7Ekiam pamtem mɨkɨmtɨ, an enselɨn faragha zuimɨn tiarim mɨkɨmtɨ, Godɨn sɨgham sara arangam. Eghtɨ Ekiamra uan nguibam ategh izighirɨtɨma gumazamizir Ekiamɨn poroghav ikiava ariaghireziba faragh ua dɨkavigham.
